biotools.summary: Efficient Detection of Hydrogen Bonds (EDHB) is a tool that systematically detects hydrogen bonds based on the nearest neighbors algorithm. EDHB classifies inter- and intramolecular hydrogen bonds as well as hydrogen bond networks.

bioschemas.name: EDHB
bioschemas.summary: Efficient Detection of Hydrogen Bonds (EDHB) is a tool that systematically detects hydrogen bonds based on the nearest neighbors algorithm. EDHB classifies inter- and intramolecular hydrogen bonds as well as hydrogen bond networks.
